details.arabic_diacless: ربنا لا تزغ قلوبنا بعد اذ هديتنا وهب لنا من لدنك رحمة‌ ۚانك انت الوهاب‏
details.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغۡ قُلُوۡبَنَا بَعۡدَ اِذۡ هَدَيۡتَنَا وَهَبۡ لَنَا مِنۡ لَّدُنۡكَ رَحۡمَةً‌ ۚاِنَّكَ اَنۡتَ الۡوَهَّابُ‏
details.transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba'da idh hadaytana wa hab lana milladunka rahmah innaka antal Wahhab
details.translations: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower.

details.arabic_diacless: ربناۤ انك جامع الناس ليوم لا ريب فيه‌ؕ ان اللٰه لا يخلف الميعاد
details.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اِنَّكَ جَامِعُ النَّاسِ لِيَوۡمٍ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيۡهِ‌ؕ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يُخۡلِفُ الۡمِيۡعَادَ
details.transliteration: Rabbana innaka jamiAAu annasiliyawmin la rayba feehi inna Allaha layukhlifu almeeAAad
details.translations: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise."
